original_title: 飛び出す立体映画 イナズマン
overview: The moth-like superhero Inazuman has the climactic battle with Emperor Bamba and the Neo-Human Empire Phantom Army while also confronting the rise of President Geisel and the Desper Corps.  An alternate version of events depicted in the TV series, exhibited theatrically in 3-D.
title: Flying from the Movie Screen: Inazuman
